state.response: ناروے کے پاس یورپ میں تیل کے ذخائر ہیں
claims: Norway has oil reserves in Europe

state.response: ناروے کے پاس یورپ میں تیل کے ذخائر ہیں
claims: Norway has oil reserves in Europe

Norway has oil reserves in Europe: Does Norway have oil reserves? Norway oil reserves Europe

Oil Reserves in Norway Norway has proven reserves equivalent to 69 times its annual consumption levels. This means that, without Net Exports, there would be about 69 years of oil left (at current consumption levels and excluding unproven reserves).
Does Norway have oil reserves? Norway oil reserves Europe

Norway's proved oil reserves totaled 7 billion barrels as of the end of 2023. Norway's oil production totaled 2.0 million b/d in 2023 and we expect that it will continue to increase into 2025, after two decades of downward-trending production since its 3.4 million b/d peak in 2001 (Figure 3).
